purpleculture_examples:
锻炼 [ duàn liàn ]: to engage in physical exercise; to work out; to toughen; to temper
锻炼 [ duàn liàn ]: to toughen; to temper; to engage in physical exercise; to work out; (fig.) to develop one's skills; to train oneself
锻造 [ duàn zào ]: to forge (metal); forging
久经锻炼 [ jiǔ jīng duàn liàn ]: to have undergone long-term physical training (idiom)
锻铁 [ duàn tiě ]: wrought iron

heisig_chinese_memo: The metal is forged in a certain section of the country containing many metal factories.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: As a discriminating metalsmith, I use the highest grade metals when forgeing such precision devices as staple guns and missiles.

Seal characters (1)

锻字的基本解释

锻
（鍛）
duàn
把金属放在火里烧，然后用锤子打：锻工。锻件。锻接。锻炼。锻压。锻造。
锤击：“取石来锻之”。

锻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duàn］
［《廣韻》丁貫切，去换，端。］
“锻1”的繁体字。
(1)打铁；锻造。
(2)锻铁的砧石。
(3)用锤子敲打。
(4)引申为细切。
(5)比喻反复推敲，锤炼。
(6)罗织罪名，陷人于罪。
(7)通“腶”。脯、干肉。

锻字的英文翻译

◎ 锻
forge

锻字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鍛； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1328第06
【唐韻】丁貫切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】都玩切，?音碫。【說文】小冶。从金段聲。【徐曰】椎之而已，不消，故曰小冶。【倉頡篇】椎也。【廣韻】打鐵。【增韻】冶金曰鍛。【書·費誓】鍛乃戈矛。【傳】鍛鍊戈矛也。【晉書·嵆康傳】康好鍛，每於柳樹下鍛，鍾會造之，康鍛如故。　又【前漢·路溫舒傳】上奏畏卻，則鍛鍊而周內之。【註】精熟周悉，致之法中也。【後漢·韋彪傳】鍛鍊之吏，持心近薄。【註】鍛鍊，猶言成熟也。言深文之吏，入人之罪，猶工冶陶鑄鍛鍊，使之成熟也。　又【儀禮·喪服】鍛而勿灰。【疏】冠用六升布，加以水濯，勿用灰而已。又【士喪禮·功布註】功布，鍛濯灰治之布也。　又【馬融·長笛賦】靁叩鍛之岌峇兮。【註】叩鍛，岌峇，爲聲。倉頡篇曰：鍛，椎也。　又與腶通。【左傳·哀十一年·腶脯釋文】腶，丁亂反。亦作鍛。【穀梁傳·莊二十四年】婦人之贄，棗栗鍛脩。【註】鍛，丁亂反。脯也。鍛而加薑桂曰脩。　又【詩·大雅】取厲取鍛。【傳】鍛，石也。【箋】鍛厲斧斤之石。【釋文】鍛本又作碫

锻字的源字形

锻字的起名意思

指把金属加热后锤打加工。

Forge
Basic explanation of words
Forge
(Forging)
duàn
Put the metal in the fire, then hit it with a hammer: blacksmith. Forgings. Forging. work out. Forging. forging.
Hammering: "Take the stone to forge it".
Forge
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duàn］
["Guangyun" Ding Guanqi, change, end. ]
The traditional characters of "forging 1".
(1) Ironing; forging.
(2) Anvil of wrought iron.
(3) Hit with a hammer.
(4) The extension is fine cutting.
(5) The analogy is repeatedly scrutinized and tempered.
(6) Luo Zhi was accused of crimes.
(7) Through "腶". Candied and dried meat.

forge
Forge
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　 Forging; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1328 Page 06
[Tang Yun] Ding Guanqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun] All play cutting,? Yin Ling. [Said the text] Xiaoye. From the sound of Jin Duan. [Xu Yue] It's just vertebrae, so it's called Xiaoye. [Cangjie articles] Shiiya. [Guang Yun] Strike the iron. 【Add rhyme】Metallurgy is called forging. [Book·Fee] Forging Nai Ge spear. [Biography] Exercise the spear. [Book of Jin·The Biography of Yongkang] Kang Haoduan, every time he forged under a willow tree, the bell would make it, and Kang Duan would stay the same.　[Previous Han·Lu Wenshu Biography] Played with fear, then exercised within a week. [Note] Being proficient in Zhou Xi, Zhi Zhi Zhong is also. [The Biography of Later Han Wei Biao] An official who exercises, keeps his heart close and thin. [Note] Exercise is still mature. An official who speaks profoundly and literally is a crime of infiltrating people is still hardened and tempered to make him mature.　[Rituals·Mourning Clothes] Forged without ashes. 【Sparse】Use six liters of cloth for the crown, add water to it, don't use ash only. Also [Shifu Funeral·Gong Cloth Note] Gong cloth, the cloth for forging the ash rule.　[Ma Rong·Flute Fu] The awkwardness of forging. [Note] Knocking, babbling, sound. The Cangjie chapter says: Forging, Shiiya.　 and 腶 again. [Zuo Zhuan·Eleventh Years of Amour·Explanation of the Poetry] 腶, Ding chaotic. Also forging. [Guliang Chuan·Zhuang Twenty-four Years] The wife's Zhi, Zaoli Duanxiu. [Note] Forging, Ding chaotic. Candied. Forging and adding Jiang Gui said repair.　[Poetry·Daya] Forge hard. [Biography] Forging, stone also. [Note] Forging a sharp axe stone. 【Explanation】Forging this and making 碫

锻
形声字。金(年)表意,表示把金属加热后锤打;段(dudn)表声,段有锤打义。形旁简化。本义是把金属加热后锤
打。

Кузница
Пиктофонетические символы.
Цзинь (нянь) выражает значение, что означает, что металл нагревается и забивается; Дуань (дудн) выражает звук, а Дуань имеет значение удара молотком.
Упростите форму.
Первоначальное значение - забивать металл после нагрева.
Нагрейте металл и забейте его молотком: ~ Iron | ~ Connect | ~ Smelt.
~ молоток ~ заготовка ~ печь ~ форма ~ прессование ~ ролик ~

duàn
I гл.
1) ковать; кованый
锻金 ковать металл; кованый металл
2) обжигать, кальцинировать (известь, лекарства)
锻石灰 известь, обожжённый известняк
3) * колотить, бить, ударять, разбивать
取石来锻之 взять камень и разбить её (жемчужину)
II сущ.
